Our Services

Custom Web Development

We build high-performance, scalable, and fully customized websites tailored to your business needs, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Website Rebrand/Redesign

Give your website a fresh, modern look with a complete rebrand or redesign that enhances aesthetics, functionality, and user engagement.

API Development & Integration

We create and integrate powerful APIs to connect your systems, streamline processes, and improve overall efficiency.

Build Automated Tests

Ensure your website or app runs flawlessly with our automated testing solutions, minimizing bugs and enhancing performance.

Web Designing

Our expert UI/UX designers craft visually stunning, user-friendly designs that captivate visitors and boost conversions.

SaaS Development

We develop robust, cloud-based SaaS solutions tailored to your industry, helping you scale and streamline your business operations.

Mission Statement

At ShvedkoDev, we’re dedicated to helping businesses achieve their goals through expertly crafted digital solutions. We believe that every business is unique, which is why we take a customized approach to every project we work on. Our team of experienced developers and designers work together to create solutions that are tailored to meet your individual needs. We’re committed to excellence, and we strive to exceed your expectations every step of the way.

Our Team

Hennadii

Managing director - CEO & CTO

Hennadii is a seasoned web developer and entrepreneur who is passionate about innovation and technology. He founded ShvedkoDev to help businesses unlock their full potential through digital solutions that drive results.

Anton

CDO & Lead Front-end developer

Anton is a creative and talented designer and front-end developer who brings a fresh perspective to every project he works on. With his keen eye for detail and passion for aesthetics, he creates beautiful and functional designs that exceed expectations.

Alex

CMO & Lead Back-end developer

Alex is a skilled back-end developer with a passion for creating efficient and scalable solutions that drive business growth. He is dedicated to helping businesses streamline their operations and achieve their goals through innovative technology.
